Queries.Query: select to_char( sysdate, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDateFrom from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-1, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-2, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-3, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-4, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-5, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-6, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-7, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual

select to_char( sysdate, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDateTo from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-1, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-2, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-3, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-4, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-5, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-6, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual union all select to_char( sysdate-7, 'dd.mm.yyyy') ParamDate from dual
select 1 ParamShiftFrom from dual union all select 2 from dual
select 1 ParamShiftTo from dual union all select 2 from dual

select 'Простои внесённые автоматически за период '|| to_char(:ParamDateFrom,'dd.mm.yyyy')||' ' ||:ParamShiftFrom||' смены по '|| to_char(:ParamDateTo,'dd.mm.yyyy')||' '|| :ParamShiftTo||' смену для ' ||:ParamType||'' title from dual;

select 1 as KOL ,'Самосвалы' as TYPE_TABLE ,VEHID ,TIMESTOP ,TIMEGO ,GMTTIMESTOP ,GMTTIMELATESTKNOWN ,TIMELATESTKNOWN ,AUTOSTOPID ,USERSTOPID ,IDLESTOPTYPE ,IDLESTOPTYPEAUTO ,XBEGIN ,YBEGIN ,XEND ,YEND ,SHOVIDAUTO ,TIMELOAD ,XLOAD ,YLOAD ,IDLESTOPTYPEUSER ,SHIFTDATE ,SHIFTNUM ,ENGINEWORKTIME ,NOTE ,REPAIRPLACE ,MOVINGTYPE ,WEIGHTSTOP ,WEIGHTGO ,FUELSTOP ,FUELGO ,UNLOADIDAUTO ,TIMEUNLOAD ,XUNLOAD ,YUNLOAD ,TIMEREFUELSTART ,XREFUEL ,YREFUEL ,PLANNED ,DRVSTOPTYPE ,EQUIPMENTID
from DISPATCHER.IDLESTOPPAGES
where (:ParamType = 'Самосвалы' or :ParamType = 'Вся техника') and TIMESTOP between dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeFrom('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftFrom, :ParamDateFrom) and dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeTo('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftTo, :ParamDateTo)
union all
select 1 as KOL ,'Бульдозеры' as TYPE_TABLE ,VEHID ,TIMESTOP ,TIMEGO ,GMTTIMESTOP ,GMTTIMELATESTKNOWN ,TIMELATESTKNOWN ,AUTOSTOPID ,USERSTOPID ,IDLESTOPTYPE ,IDLESTOPTYPEAUTO ,XBEGIN ,YBEGIN ,XEND ,YEND ,SHOVIDAUTO ,TIMELOAD ,XLOAD ,YLOAD ,IDLESTOPTYPEUSER ,SHIFTDATE ,SHIFTNUM ,ENGINEWORKTIME ,NOTE ,REPAIRPLACE ,MOVINGTYPE ,WEIGHTSTOP ,WEIGHTGO ,FUELSTOP ,FUELGO ,UNLOADIDAUTO ,TIMEUNLOAD ,XUNLOAD ,YUNLOAD ,TIMEREFUELSTART ,XREFUEL ,YREFUEL ,PLANNED ,DRVSTOPTYPE ,EQUIPMENTID
from DISPATCHER.IDLESTOPPAGES_AUX
where (:ParamType = 'Бульдозеры' or :ParamType = 'Вся техника') and TIMESTOP between dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeFrom('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftFrom, :ParamDateFrom) and dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeTo('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftTo, :ParamDateTo)
union all
select 1 as KOL ,'Экскаваторы' as TYPE_TABLE ,VEHID ,TIMESTOP ,TIMEGO ,GMTTIMESTOP ,GMTTIMELATESTKNOWN ,TIMELATESTKNOWN ,AUTOSTOPID ,USERSTOPID ,IDLESTOPTYPE ,IDLESTOPTYPEAUTO ,XBEGIN ,YBEGIN ,XEND ,YEND ,SHOVIDAUTO ,TIMELOAD ,XLOAD ,YLOAD ,IDLESTOPTYPEUSER ,SHIFTDATE ,SHIFTNUM ,ENGINEWORKTIME ,NOTE ,REPAIRPLACE ,MOVINGTYPE ,WEIGHTSTOP ,WEIGHTGO ,FUELSTOP ,FUELGO ,UNLOADIDAUTO ,TIMEUNLOAD ,XUNLOAD ,YUNLOAD ,TIMEREFUELSTART ,XREFUEL ,YREFUEL ,PLANNED ,DRVSTOPTYPE ,0 EQUIPMENTID
from DISPATCHER.IDLESTOPPAGES_SHOV
where (:ParamType = 'Экскаваторы' or :ParamType = 'Вся техника') and TIMESTOP between dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeFrom('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftFrom, :ParamDateFrom) and dispatcher.GetPredefinedTimeTo('за указанную смену', :ParamShiftTo, :ParamDateTo)
order by TIMESTOP desc
